Body:
ds = RemoteDataService()
ds.init_from_config(data_config)
dv = DataView()
props = {'start_date': 20170227, 'end_date': 20170327, 'universe':
    '000016.SH', 'fields': 'open,high,low,close,vwap,volume,turnover,' +
    'sw1,zz2,' + 'roe,net_assets,' +
    'total_oper_rev,oper_exp,tot_profit,int_income', 'freq': 1}
dv.init_from_config(props, ds)
dv.prepare_data()
data_bench = dv.data_benchmark.copy()
dv.data_benchmark = data_bench
try:
    dv.data_benchmark = data_bench.iloc[3:]
except ValueError:
    pass
dv.remove_field('roe,net_assets')
dv.remove_field('close')
